description: An ancient river, attested between Kaulonia and Lokroi Epizephyrioi. The Sagra(s) is perhaps to be identified with the modern Allaro.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: between Kaulonia and Lokroi Epizephyrioi, perhaps Allaro
